Configuration.Name: L1=L2=4m_central_NOAP
Configuration.SetupScript: import time # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # !!! Warning: it is not recommended to manually drive the attenuator sics.drive('nvs_lambda', 5.0) sics.set('/instrument/velocity_selector/wavelength', 5.0) # Drive detector to short position sics.set('/instrument/detector/detector_y/speed', 53) driveDet(3200,0) # Drive entrance aperture to 50 mm square driveEntRotAp(180) # Drive guide to g7 driveGuide('g7') # Drive entrance aperture to 180 (for guide g7) driveEntRotAp(180) # Drive beamstops up selBs(2) # set beamcentres sics.set('beamcenterx', 34.2079) sics.set('beamcenterz', 95.2011)

Transmission.SetupScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(36, 100) # Drive attenuator to 300 driveAtt(300) # !!! Warning: it is not recommended to manually drive the attenuator

Scattering.SetupScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # !!! Warning: it is not recommended to manually drive the attenuator # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(38, 0) driveBsz(261)
